import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' function CreateStudent() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ name: '', email: '', age: '', gender: '' }) const navigate = useNavigate() function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:5000/add_user', values) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); // Check the response from the server navigate('/'); // Redirect to the home page }) .catch((err) => console.error("Error:", err)); } return (

Add Student

setValues({...values, name: e.target.value})} />
setValues({...values, email: e.target.value})} />
setValues({...values, gender: e.target.value})} />
setValues({...values, age: e.target.value})} />
) } export default CreateStudent
